body:
> Why should that raise an error?

We don't support any output arguments that are views. The logic for in-place modifications to views doesn't fully extend to out=... arguments that are views, so we just throw an exception if any of the out=... arguments are views.

> Normally we are able to propagate in-place changes to views to the base, right? 

Yes

> Also, does zeros_like retain requires_grad flag?

No
